alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 7:17AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jim Wells and northwestern Kleberg Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 716 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Ben Bolt, or 11 miles west of Kingsville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alice, Premont, Ben Bolt and Alice Acres. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 676 and 700. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
